title: Grilled Rosemary Salmon Spedini
directions: Combine rosemary, oil, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add salmon; toss to coat. Alternating the salmon and tomatoes, divide among eight 12-inch skewers.
Oil the grill rack. Grill the spedini, carefully turning once, until the salmon is cooked through, 4 to 6 minutes total. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 pound center-cut salmon fillet, skinned (see Tip) and cut into 1-inch cubes
